ygData.subject: Re: On alliance again
ygData.msgSnippet: 1 Whirl is now broken by using any type of stun on the creature that is spinning. So if someone bashes, or kicks, or you use one of your direct damage spells
ygData.messageBody:
1> Whirl is now broken by using any type of stun on the creature that is
spinning. So if someone bashes, or kicks, or you use one of your direct
damage spells that has the mythical stun component it WILL break out of
Whirl.

2> Memory Blur USED TO be unresistable! Even GZ stated that was reason he
liked it. Now it's POINTLESS. It does LESS than Mes, because it doesn't hold
them in place at all AND it also can be resisted AND it costs more mana!

This gimping of the Enchanter is REALLY STARTING TO PISS ME OFF! One of the
highest level enchanters on Tarew Marr (Mixelplux, level 24) is quitting his
char because of it. This is totally insane.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 2:37 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
>
>
> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> I haven't had any problems with whirl. In what way is it supposed to be
> broken?
>
> I haven't had any problem with memory blur because I am still using
> mesmerize. I didn't notice that memory blur offered anything else
> besides an
> increased mana use...
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Hapke, Matthew [SMTP:mahapke@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 2:36 PM
> > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
> >
> > From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
> >
> > IMproved the effectiveness of what spells?!?
> > I have seen these improvements for us lately:
> >
> > 1. Memory Blur can now be resisted.
> > 2. Whirl Can now be broken
> > 3. Whirl now has a horridly random amount of time.
> >
> > So, what exactly is better here?
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Shawn Alley [SMTP:ShawnA@...]

> > > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'

> > >

> > >
> > > Variant just improved the effectiveness of some spells. They may work
> > > on this spell (and others) if we continue to let them know the spell
> > > isn't doing what we expected. So keep your hopes up, this line of
> > > spells may be more powerful at some point!
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: HiFi Review [mailto:hifireview@...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:18 PM
> > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
> > >
> > >
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
